page.title: 20Philips Research Laboratory
page.content: {Philips Research Laboratories}in Redhill employ{500}people.They work on many aspects of{electronic research. They are investigating ways of making {thin television sets}so that they can be hung on the wall and also trying to improve the quality of the picture. Another area of work is to find more applications for the{Compact Disc which is now replacing the gramophone record.One possible use is as an {electronic dictionary}which will show the meaning of a word on screen and also pronounce the word. Philips are also trying to make computers appear more intelligent by writing programmes which will help the engineer to determine what is wrong when the equipment breaks down. Another area is finding ways of improving{radio communication}between vehicles for motorists, police etc.
